answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestion. A diabetes tracker is a high priority for us. We'll let you know when it's available.Thanks,MedHelp

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: You should make a diabetes tracker. It could track blood sugar readings, insulin doses, oral meds doses, exersice etc.
title: diabetes tracker
